Skill_Descriptions.1: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 30%.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 35%.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 40%.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Attacks that hit weak spots have 15% increased affinity.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Attacks that hit weak spots have 30% increased affinity.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Attacks that hit weak spots have 50% increased affinity.

Skill_Descriptions.1: While active, increases affinity by 10% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
Skill_Descriptions.2: While active, increases affinity by 20% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
Skill_Descriptions.3: While active, increases affinity by 30% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
Skill_Descriptions.4: While active, increases affinity by 40% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
Skill_Descriptions.5: While active, increases affinity by 50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

Skill_Descriptions.1: +10% damage to hard targets and a 50% reduction to your attacks being deflected.
Skill_Descriptions.2: +15% damage to hard targets and a 100% reduction to your attacks being deflected.
Skill_Descriptions.3: +30% damage to hard targets and a 100% reduction to your attacks being deflected.

Skill_Descriptions.1: +5% attack power when your weapon sharpness gauge is yellow or lower.
Skill_Descriptions.2: +10% attack power when your sharpness gauge is yellow or lower.
Skill_Descriptions.3: +10% attack power when your sharpness gauge is green or lower.

Skill_Descriptions.1: 5% faster gauge fill rate and 5% faster charge times.
Skill_Descriptions.2: 10% faster gauge fill rate and 10% faster charge times.
Skill_Descriptions.3: 20% faster gauge fill rate and 15% faster charge times.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Slightly boosts the duration weapons are powered up.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Boosts the duration weapons are powered up.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Greatly boosts the duration weapons are powered up.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Very slightly decreases the impact of attacks.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Slightly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
Skill_Descriptions.4: Decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
Skill_Descriptions.5: Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Applies a minor chance to stun. Attack power of draw attacks +3
Skill_Descriptions.2: Applies a chance to stun. Attack power of draw attacks +5
Skill_Descriptions.3: Applies a great chance to stun. Attack power of draw attacks +7

Skill_Descriptions.1: Increases power of each attack by 10% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 15%.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Increases power of each attack by 20% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 30%.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Increases power of each attack by 30% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 50%.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Increases ammo and coating reloading speed.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Gunlance loading capacity +1 Increases charge blade phials

Skill_Descriptions.1: Increases power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 10%.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Increases power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 20%.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Slightly increases the power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Increases the power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Greatly increases the power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Slightly increases the power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Increases the power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Greatly increases the power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Slightly increases the power of Spread Ammo, Shrapnel Ammo, and Spread-type arrows.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Increases the power of Spread Ammo, Shrapnel Ammo, and Spread-type arrows.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Greatly increases the power of Spread Ammo, Shrapnel Ammo, and Spread-type arrows.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Expands clip size for some ammo types.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Expands clip size for many ammo types.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Expands clip size for most ammo types.

Skill_Descriptions.2: Bowgun speed +2. Loads bow coating automatically.

Skill_Descriptions.1: While active, reduces damage taken by 15%.
Skill_Descriptions.2: While active, reduces damage taken by 30%.
Skill_Descriptions.3: While active, reduces damage taken by 50%.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Doubles the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Triples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Quadruples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Nullifies weak monster roars and reduces the effects of strong monster roars.
Skill_Descriptions.4: Nullifies weak and strong monster roars.
Skill_Descriptions.5: Nullifies weak and strong monster roars. Reduces the effects of powerful monster roars.

Skill_Descriptions.2: Negates minor and major wind pressure.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Negates minor and major wind pressure and reduces the effects of dragon wind pressure.

Skill_Descriptions.2: Nullifies minor ground tremors and reduces the effects of major ground tremors.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Nullifies minor and major ground tremors.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Reduces the effects of weak bubbleblight.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Nullifies major and minor bubbleblight and increases evasiveness while afflicted with bubbleblight.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Evading further attacks will inflicts bubbleblight.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 50%.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 75%.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Reduces the number of times you take poison damage.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Greatly reduces the number of times you take poison damage.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 30%.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 60%.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Reduces the duration of sleep by 30%.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Reduces the duration of sleep by 60%.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Reduces the duration of stun by 60%.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Reduces the duration of stun by 90%.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Greatly delays blastblight and greatly reduces blast damage.

Skill_Descriptions.1: One extra consumable herb item per gather.
Skill_Descriptions.2: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, or seed item per gather.
Skill_Descriptions.3: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, or insect item per gather.
Skill_Descriptions.4: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, insect, or mushroom item per gather.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Allows you to gather one extra time from gathering points.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Allows you to gather one extra time from mining outcrops.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Removes one cycle from the sharpening process.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Removes two cycles from the sharpening process.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Removes three cycles from the sharpening process.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Lets you digest blue mushrooms and toadstools.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Additionally lets you digest nitroshrooms and parashrooms.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Additionally lets you digest mandragoras and exciteshrooms.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 33% of their efficacy.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Skill_Descriptions.4: Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Skill_Descriptions.5: Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with full efficacy.

Skill_Descriptions.1: While active, increases defense by 50 points.
Skill_Descriptions.5: While active, attack power +30% and defense-increasing effects are negated.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Increases attack by 10% and defense by 15% with each use.

Skill_Descriptions.2: Prevents knockbacks. Tripping is reduced to a knockback instead.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 50%.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 100%.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Prevents your stamina cap from decreasing.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Makes filling the Riding Gauge easier and increases ease of parrying.
Extends the duration you can keep a Wirebug by 30%.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Further increases passive Wirebug recovery rate.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Further increases passive recovery rate while on the ground.

Skill_Descriptions.1: Reduces stamina consumption by 25% while wall running.
Skill_Descriptions.2: Reduces stamina consumption by 50% while wall running.
Skill_Descriptions.3: Wall running temporarily increases attack power.
Inflicts hellfireblight when monsters are enraged.
Skill_Descriptions.4: Effect persists for one minute after a monster's rage has subsided.
